name: Army Soldier Jungle Battle Escape
description:
It's a crazy day for jungle warfare! Dangers are lurking with every step. Your aim is to help your soldier succesfully make his way to freedom by avoid all the obstacles in his way.

Swipe up to jump low approaching objects or swipe down to slide under higher approaching objects. If you're struck by an object you'll be returned to start of the level to try again.

Features:
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
